SCTX - Script Source:
ScriptName fbmwFavesAndasScript

Begin OnPackageEnd fbmwmvmonsterdiseasefollow
	SetStage fbmwHTShishi 60
	SET fbmwHTShishi.FollowNow TO 0
	mwFavesAndasREF.EvaluatePackage
END

Begin GameMode
	if GetStage fbmwHTShishi < 60
		IF GetDistance mwShishiMapMarker <= 256
			SetStage fbmwHTShishi 60
			SET fbmwHTShishi.FollowNow TO 0
			mwFavesAndasREF.EvaluatePackage
		ENDIF
	endif
END
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 376 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
